Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.organization.OrganizationList

  • Packages that use OrganizationList 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.directory  
    com.stormpath.sdk.tenant  

    • Uses of OrganizationList in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.directory that return OrganizationList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OrganizationList Directory.getOrganizations()
      Returns a paginated list of all Organizations that map this Directory as an AccountStore.
      OrganizationList Directory.getOrganizations(Map<String,Object> queryParams)
      Returns a paginated list of all Organizations that map this Directory as an AccountStore and also match the specified query criteria.
      OrganizationList Directory.getOrganizations(OrganizationCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of all Organizations that map this Directory as an AccountStore and also match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of OrganizationList in com.stormpath.sdk.tenant

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.tenant that return OrganizationList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OrganizationList TenantActions.getOrganizations()
      Returns a paginated list of all of the current tenant's Organization instances.
      OrganizationList TenantActions.getOrganizations(Map<String,Object> queryParams)
      Returns a paginated list of the current tenant's organizations that match the specified query criteria.
      OrganizationList TenantActions.getOrganizations(OrganizationCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the current tenant's organizations that match the specified query criteria.
